Service Details: - Offers services and programs to build the capacity of our members and advocate on their behalf to improve the landscape for organized sport in BC- Strengthens and builds the capacity of the Provincial Sport Organization in order to encourage and foster the growth of sport in BC- Works with the amateur community to provide quality opportunities for athletic development and achievement, and build healthy communities
